comment.text:
What do you mean by that? REST API, like [1]?

[1] https://gerrit-review.googlesource.com/Documentation/rest-api-changes.html

To start with I mean extending [this][1] to support inserting a ticket Change (the kernel of a ticket).

However, on my long-term agenda is to implement a more RESTful API to allow a rich client-side app in Dart and/or AngularJS and get away from server-side page generation - ot at least less server-side page generation.  One thing I have been considering is reverse-mapping something like [this][2] but I'm not sure how well that will go over in light of the the recent Google-Oracle reversal.

[1]: http://gitblit.com/rpc.html#H5
[2]: https://github.com/kohsuke/github-api
